verses.verse: My son, if you will receive My words, and treasure up My commandments with you,
so that your ear attends to wisdom, you shall stretch out your heart to understanding.
For if you cry for discernment, giving forth your voice for understanding;
if you seek her as silver, and search for her as hidden treasures,
then you shall understand the fear of Jehovah and find knowledge of God.
For Jehovah gives wisdom; out of His mouth are knowledge and understanding.
He lays up sound wisdom for the upright ones; He is a shield to those who walk in integrity,
to guard the paths of judgment, and He guards the way of His godly ones.
Then you shall understand righteousness and judgment and uprightness; yea, every good path.
When wisdom enters into your heart, and knowledge is pleasant to your soul,
discretion shall keep you, understanding shall watch over you;
to deliver you from the evil way, from the man speaking perversity;
those who leave the paths of uprightness to walk in the ways of darkness,
rejoicing to do evil; they delight in the perversity of the evil one,
whose paths are crooked and being devious in their tracks,
these will deliver you from the strange woman, from the foreign woman flattering by her words,
who forsakes the guide of her youth, and forgets the covenant of her God.
For her house leads down to death, and her tracks to the departed spirits.
All going in to her do not return, and not do they reach the paths of life.
Then you may walk in the ways of the good and keep the ways of the righteous ones.
For the upright ones shall live in the land, and the blameless shall remain in it;
but the wicked ones shall be cut off from the earth, and ones acting deceitfully shall be rooted out of it.
